results.name: ELEPHANT GUN NANO: Last Hope of the Pachy Tribunal

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 19.04 x64 or equivalent (glibc 2.29)
  • Processor: Intel Sandy Bridge, AMD Zen
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GPU with OpenGL 3.3 support
  • Storage: 25 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Optional
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
